beer.name: Winter Ale
beer.description: Smuttynose Winter Ale is a full-bodied, amber beer brewed with a special Trappist ale yeast. Stylisticallyreminiscent of a Belgian Abbey Double, it features fruity aromas and flavor, balanced by soft Crystal hops.Warming, mellow & pleasantly complex, Smuttynose Winter Ale is your perfect cold weather companion.Available in sixpacks and on draft from late October through January.
